question: 証拠
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>evidence</kanji> is <kanji>based on</kanji> something. What is it based on? This <vocabulary>physical evidence</vocabulary>. Ha ha! Guilty!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You just need to remember that <ja>拠</ja> is using the <ja>こ</ja> reading you learned, not the <ja>きょ</ja> one. Just remember that you can never trust the word of a <ja>子</ja> (<ja>こ</ja>), so you always require them to provide <vocabulary>physical evidence</vocabulary>.
